money.zumo.zumokit

Class ZumoKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • money.zumo.zumokit.ZumoKit

  • public class ZumoKit
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry point to ZumoKit Android SDK.

    Once ZumoKit is initialized, this class provides access to user retrieval, ZumoKit state object, crypto utility class and historical exchange rates. State change listeners can be added and removed.

    See Getting Started guide for usage details.

      • ZumoKit

        public ZumoKit(java.lang.String apiKey,
               java.lang.String apiRoot,
               java.lang.String txServiceUrl)
        Initializes ZumoKit SDK. Should only be called once.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - ZumoKit Api-Key
        apiRoot - ZumoKit API url
        txServiceUrl - ZumoKit Transaction Service url

      • getHistoricalExchangeRates

        public void getHistoricalExchangeRates(HistoricalExchangeRatesCallback callback)
        Fetch historical exchange rates for supported time intervals. On success callback returns historical exchange rates are contained in a mapping between time interval on a top level, from currency on second level, to currency on third level and ExchangeRate objects.
        Parameters:
        callback - an interface to receive the result or error
        See Also:
        HistoricalExchangeRatesInterval

      • addStateListener

        public void addStateListener(StateListener listener)
        Listen to all state changes. Refer to ZumoKit State guide for details.
        Parameters:
        listener - interface to listen to state changes

      • removeStateListener

        public void removeStateListener(StateListener listener)
        Remove listener to state changes. Refer to ZumoKit State guide for details.
        Parameters:
        listener - interface to listen to state changes
